about.description: Trid UI is a lightweight desktop application that provides a user-friendly interface for TrID, a powerful tool for scanning and analyzing files.
about.made_by: This application was created by Cufiy and is based on the original TrID software developed by Marco Pontello. The app icon is based on eye icon by icons8.com

home.click_to_browse: Click to browse or drag a file here
home.files_processed_locally: Files are processed locally, nothing is uploaded
